title: Exclusive: Nayte Talks Getting the First Impression Rose
description:
It’s “Bachelor Happy Hour’s” first interview of the new season of “The Bachelorette,” and First Impression Rose recipient Nayte is here talking to Becca and Tayshia about his excitement and nerves going into night one and his journey so far. 

Nayte discusses it all, including a wild story about how he came to be part of Michelle’s season, how nervous he was being the first man out of the limo, and whether he knew just how significant receiving Michelle’s First Impression Rose really was. He also details his initial conversation with Michelle and shares how important it was to him to remain as authentic as possible throughout his experience.  

Then, in a hilarious game, Nayte shares his thoughts on the other men in Michelle’s season and teases lots of exciting things still to come on this season of “The Bachelorette.” 

“Bachelor Happy Hour” has exclusive interviews every week. Watch “The Bachelorette” on ABC and listen to “Bachelor Happy Hour” the next morning.  

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
